title: Mate Magic
description: In Mate Magic we continue the Westwood Pack Series with Skarlyt’s story.SkarlytMy mate left me rejected and broken on the bathroom floor. Don't worry I'm going to make him pay. Once I pick myself up and dust myself off, I'll come back stronger than he could ever imagine. He left me with more than a broken heart though.When he decides that he made a mistake it leaves me wondering how far he will go to get what he wants most?LennoxRejected at first glance, she didn't even know my name. Who does that to a person? When my sisters join a new pack it offers me a chance at a new life, how could I turn that down? Meeting a sexy witch isn’t what I envisioned for myself, I just need to make sure her crazy ex doesn’t get his hands on her. Join Skarlyt on her journey to regain control of her life and find her happy ever after. There are crazy ex’s, insane mages and maybe even some sexy vampires.
author: F.D. Fair
